name: Boatmen
description:
DOWNLOADING TO PLAY IS RECOMMENDED, PERFORMANCE IS NOT GREAT ON BROWSER.

Boatmen is a short narrative driven game about two sailors trying to make it home. It's a short experience with some replayability.  Your choices will shape the narrative and the ending.

Made for the Black and White Jam 4.

FEATURES

  • A captivating atmosphere.
  • 8 different endings.
  • Your choices effect majority of the dialogue.
